course.subject: TEMG
course.name: Special Project: Inter-Varsity Entrepreneurship Challenge 2015 - Singapore
course.description: HKUST Students will join students from Nanyang Technological University, and University of California, Berkeley to work in a multi-discipline and multi-cultural environment to develop startup businesses leveraging breakthroughs in technologies, business innovations to impact a lot of lives. The pedagogy of the competition relies on an intensive residential period with fellow students from around the world including daily combination of student teamwork, company visits, field research, coaching by mentors with different specialties and iterations of startup pitching. Learning objectives include: (1) Improve global culture awareness and sensitivity; (2) Improve knowledge in water technology; (3) Improve skills in business planning and pitching; and (4) Improve project planning, team coordination and leadership skills. Enrollment in the project course requires approval of the course instructor.
